metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000211 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Doorkeeper version 4.2.0 and later contains a Incorrect Access Control vulnerability in Token revocation API's authorized method that can result in Access tokens are not revoked for public OAuth apps, leaking access until expiry.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000211` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-doorkeeper - 4.4.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-doorkeeper package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.2-1').
